text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ActRelationshipType where concept is-a OUTC

name: ActRelationshipOutcome
title: ActRelationshipOutcome
description: An observation that should follow or does actually follow as a result or consequence of a condition or action (sometimes called "post-condition".) Target must be an observation as a goal, risk or any criterion. For complex outcomes a conjunction attribute
